content: WDB-S Spade bit Spade bit for fast drilling of shallow holes in wood ### Categories: Home > Products > Tool inserts > Metal, wood and other material drill bits- - - ### FEATURES:Features Self-feeding threaded tip for fast and easier drilling into wood with less vibration Spur and reamer edges create cleaner holes Up to 10x faster than conventional spade bits Wing tips and cupped spade increase the speed and ease of drilling Connection end with hex shank groove for use with all SID, SFH and SF power tools Applications Drilling small- to medium-diameter holes in soft or hard wood Ideal for drilling overhead, for use with SID impact tools ### TECHNICAL DATA: Connection end: Hex shank Base material: Wood, Wood composites Working length: 4 in Technical Data | Connection end | 1/4 in hexagonal | Base material | Wood, Wood composites | Working length | 100 mm | Working mode | Drilling, Impact Drilling | Product Class | Ultimate ### ITEMS- 2025592 - Spade bit WDB-S-H1/4 1x6 - Package Size 3 pc - 2025596 - Wood spade bit 1-1/2 x 6 - Package Size 3 pc - 2025594 - Wood spade bit 1-1/4 x 6 - Package Size 3 pc - 2025593 - Wood spade bit 1-1/8 x 6 - Package Size 3 pc - 2025595 - Wood spade bit 1-3/8 x 6 - Package Size 3 pc - 2025586 - Spade bit WDB-S-H1/4 1/2x6 - Package Size 3 pc - 2025584 - Wood spade bit 1/4 x 6 - Package Size 3 pc - 2025590 - Wood spade bit 13/16 x 6 - Package Size 3 pc - 2025589 - Spade bit WDB-S-H1/4 3/4x6 - Package Size 3 pc - 2025585 - Spade bit WDB-S-H1/4 3/8x6 - Package Size 3 pc - 2025588 - Spade bit WDB-S-H1/4 5/8x6 - Package Size 3 pc - 2025591 - Spade bit WDB-S-H1/4 7/8x6 - Package Size 3 pc - 2025587 - Wood spade bit 9/16 x 6 - Package Size 3 pc
